thread.title: Ruth Bishop
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Ruth Bishop

author: Ruth Bishop
title: Ruth Bishop
text: I had never ordered flowers for an overseas delivery before, but found this site easy to use. The ordering was easy, although I stumbled with the request for latin alphabet to be used for the card message, so resorted to translating my English to German. It must have worked OK, as my relative appreciated the birthday wishes.
